attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore to be knighted for his 100th birthday.
attributes.background: A WW2 veteran that’s showed true spirit during these troubled times. A hero and inspiration to us all. The amount of money that he’s raised for the NHS has been awe inspiring! £12m and counting! If anyone deserves a knighthood it should be this man!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
